# zitadel_active_webkey (Resource)

Resource representing the active web key.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "zitadel_webkey" "key_v1" {
  org_id = data.zitadel_org.default.id
  rsa {}
}

resource "zitadel_webkey" "key_v2" {
  org_id = data.zitadel_org.default.id
  ecdsa {}
}

resource "zitadel_active_webkey" "default" {
  org_id = data.zitadel_org.default.id
  key_id = zitadel_webkey.key_v1.id
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `key_id` (String) The ID of the webkey to be active.

### Optional

- `org_id` (String) ID of the organization. If not provided, the organization of the authenticated user/service account is used.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

## Import

```bash
# The resource can be imported using the ID format `<org_id>:<key_id>`, e.g.
terraform import zitadel_active_webkey.imported '123456789012345678:123456789012345678'
```
